archimate:Requirement.name: SC-23(3): Session Authenticity | Unique System-generated Session Identifiers
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Generate a unique session identifier for each session with [Assignment: organization-defined randomness requirements] and recognize only session identifiers that are system-generated.

properties.value: Generating unique session identifiers curtails the ability of adversaries to reuse previously valid session IDs. Employing the concept of randomness in the generation of unique session identifiers protects against brute-force attacks to determine future session identifiers.
